prodNameC: 戴可氏人類抗單純皰疹病毒第二型免疫球蛋白G酵素免疫分析套組
prodNameE: “DIAGNOSTIC AUTOMATION” Herpes Simplex Virus 2 IgG (HSV 2 IgG)
ingredientsDesc:
HSV 2 IgG ELISA:
1.Microwell Strips	96 wells	HSV-2 antigen coated on Polystyrene wells
2.Enzyme Conjugate	12 ml	Goat anti-human IgG conjugate to Horseradish peroxidase in TBS buffer with bovine serum and ProClin-300
3.Negative Control	150 µl	Diluted human serum in buffer solution contain bovine, goat serum and sodium azide
4.Cut-Off Calibrators	150 µl	Diluted human serum in buffer solution contain bovine, goat serum and sodium azide
5.Positive Control	150 µl	Diluted human serum in buffer solution contain bovine, goat serum and sodium azide
6.Washing Concentrate 10X	100 ml	PBS buffer with detergent
7.Sample Diluent	22 ml	Bovine and goat serum in buffer solution
8.TMB Chromogenic Substrate	15 ml	TMB (<0.1%) Hydrogen Peroxide (<0.03%) DMSO (<3%)
9.Stop Solution	12 ml	HCl (< 1 molar) H2SO4(< 0.25 molar)
applicantName: 太暘生物科技股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 新北市汐止區福德三路369號12樓
efficacy: 利用酵素免疫分析法，檢測血清中的HSV-2特異性IgG抗體。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
